title: Use of native file picker
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Currently the app uses gtk file picker that doesn't even follow system theme and just blinding white for me, --followSystemTheme=true doesn't seem to do anything about that. In addition, pins from KDE Dolphin aren't pressent in gtk file picker.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Use xdg portals if possible

**Additional context**
DE: KDE Plasma
Teams installed from flatpak
